articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Solar storm danger! Unstable sunspot can send horrifying X-Class solar flares towards Earth today - HT Tech
articles.description: Sunspot AR3165 has become unstable and is set to explode, sparking a solar storm. It can send dangerous X-class solar flares towards the Earth today, December 15.
articles.content: A massive solar storm may well hit Earth sometime today. Earlier this week, it was reported that a massive region on the Earth-facing side of the Sun was filled with sunspots and magnetic filaments, … [+2409 chars]
